name: COX'S BAZAR
details: Longest natural sandy sea beach, breathtaking views, vibrant local culture, and water sports galore.

name: SREEMANGAL
details: Tea capital of Bangladesh', beautiful tea gardens, refreshing climate, and diverse wildlife.

name: SUNDARBAN
details: World's largest mangrove forest, rich biodiversity, Bengal tigers, and unique ecosystem where rivers meet the sea.

name: SAJEK
details: Serene hill station, lush green hills, tribal culture, and panoramic views of clouds kissing the hills.
